title: AI and Social Media Specialist with GHL experience
job_overview:
We’re looking for creative, tech-savvy Social Media Specialists based in the Philippines who are fluent in English, have high-speed internet, and are experienced in GoHighLevel (GHL). 
?? Fluent in English (spoken and written)
?? Reliable high-speed internet (minimum 20 Mbps)
?? Proficient in GoHighLevel (GHL)
?? Experience in content creation and social media management
?? Strong writing skills and creativity
?? Self-motivated and able to manage deadlines
?? Familiarity with Canva, CapCut, or video editing tools
?? Social platform experience: Facebook, IG, TikTok, YouTube Shorts, LinkedIn

Create and schedule engaging posts across multiple platforms
Build and manage content calendars 
Write captions, CTAs, hooks, and short-form video scripts
Edit reels/short videos (we’ll provide footage when needed)
Track analytics and optimize for reach & conversions
Use GoHighLevel to:
    Automate posts, emails, and workflows
   Manage campaigns and funnels
   Connect lead capture forms and calendars

Tech Requirements:
Laptop/PC with video editing capability
Stable high-speed internet (screenshot of speed test required)
Quiet workspace with mic/headset for occasional Zoom calls

Familiarity with:
GoHighLevel (required)
Canva
CapCut
Meta Business Suite
Launch Cart

Collaborate with our U.S.-based team weekly via Zoom
